reviewText: Together, this video and the freestyle one are a total rip-off. Like the other reviewer said, much of the two are exactly the same. They show freestyle swimming on the backstroke DVD. The bulk of the instruction is on different drills to do, almost all focusing on hip rotation, with a minuscule amount about kicking. Neither one says anything about arm movement, and you can't get a good idea of what the arm movement is supposed to be from the video. The DVD quality is bad -- it looks like it was converted from an old video tape. I didn't buy this video, just borrowed it from the library, and even for that I could not recommend wasting your time on it.

I feeled being cheated when I bought this dvd and another dvd from the

same coache: basic freestyle swimming technique for these reasons:

 1. More than half of the 2 dvds are exactly the same things, just a duplicate scenes.

 2. No underwater camera, can not see the body movements clear.

 3. A lot of talks that are not useful for learning.

 4. The prices are too high compared with other sellers.

 5. More like this dvd aim at teenagers, not for adults.
